We provide excellent teaching informed by cutting-edge research and our modular system allows a choice of subject areas and themes within a biology degree.</subtitle>   <link href="http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/ugstudy/courses/biologyandzoology/biology.aspx?RelatedItemsasStandardList_SyndicationType=2" />   <generator>Contensis: http://www.contentmanagement.co.uk</generator> <entry>     <title>Zoology BSc</title>     <link href="http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/ugstudy/courses/biologyandzoology/bsc-zoology.aspx" />     <author>       <name>Chris Walters</name>     </author>     <summary>This course is enriched by cutting-edge research across a range of disciplines, from animal behaviour, ecology and parasitology, to neurobiology and toxicology.</summary>     <title>Zoology MSci</title>     <link href="http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/ugstudy/courses/biologyandzoology/msci-zoology.aspx" />     <author>       <name>Chris Walters</name>     </author>     <summary>This course is enriched by cutting-edge research across a range of disciplines, from animal behaviour, ecology and parasitology, to neurobiology and toxicology. It offers modules in subjects ranging from conservation to immunobiology.</summary>     <published>2011-07-13T18:02:00Z</published>     <updated>2015-02-27T14:30:00Z</updated>     <id>http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/ugstudy/courses/biologyandzoology/msci-zoology.aspx</id>   </entry> </feed>
